Young Bronze Dragon
Many young bronze dragons become experts in a type of problem, like driving off pirates or protecting communities from storms. Young bronze dragons
collect friends with varied expertise, cultivating a community of experts they can rely on.
Bronze Dragon Lairs
Bronze dragons usually make their homes near or under the sea.
The region containing an adult or ancient bronze dragon’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:
Buoying Currents. Creatures within 1 mile of the lair that lack a Swim Speed ignore the extra cost of movement while swimming.
Sun and Storms. While in its lair, the dragon can cast
Control Weather, requiring no Material components and using the same spellcasting ability as its
Spellcasting action. When casting the spell this way, the dragon can control the weather within 1 mile of its lair, regardless if the dragon is inside or outside.
If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.
Adult Bronze Dragon
Languages Draconic
CR 2 (XP 450; PB +2)
